params._vaultManager: The address of the Vault Manager

governanceRecoverUnsupported(address,uin.details: This contract should never have any tokens in it at the end of a transaction

params._to: The address to receive the tokens

approveForSpender(address,address,uint25.notice: Called by Governance to approve a token address to be spent by an address

calc_token_amount(uint256[3],bool).notice: Checks the amount of 3CRV given for the amounts

calc_token_amount_withdraw(uint256,addre.notice: Checks the amount of an output token given for 3CRV

convert(address,address,uint256).notice: Converts the amount of input tokens to output tokens

convert_rate(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks the amount of input tokens to output tokens

governanceRecoverUnsupported(address,uin.notice: Allows Governance to withdraw tokens from the converter

setStrategy(address,bool).notice: Called by Governance to enable or disable a strategy to use the converter

token().notice: Returns the address of the 3CRV token

userdoc.notice: The StableSwap3PoolConverter is used to convert funds on Curve's 3Pool. This is a safe version that does not allow the vault to be used for arbitrage.
